objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFC8E8'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFB3E4'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='circleGrad' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='50%' fx='50%' fy='50%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFFFFF'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#F8F8F8'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='priceGrad' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='50%' fx='50%' fy='50%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#80D8FF'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#40C4FF'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><path d='M0,0 L1080,0 L1080,1080 C800,1000 400,1050 0,950 Z' fill='#FF80AB' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0,0 C300,100 700,50 1080,200 L1080,0 Z' fill='#B388FF' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='url(#circleGrad)' stroke='#FF4081' stroke-width='8' stroke-dasharray='15,10'/><circle cx='850' cy='400' r='120' fill='url(#priceGrad)' stroke='#40C4FF' stroke-width='5'/><g fill='#FF80AB' opacity='0.5'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='15'/><circle cx='900' cy='600' r='20'/><circle cx='300' cy='800' r='25'/><circle cx='700' cy='900' r='18'/><circle cx='150' cy='600' r='22'/></g><path d='M100,250 C150,200 200,300 250,250' stroke='#B388FF' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/><path d='M800,800 C850,750 900,850 950,800' stroke='#B388FF' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/><path d='M200,800 L250,750' stroke='#FF80AB' stroke-width='6'/><path d='M850,200 L900,150' stroke='#FF80AB' stroke-width='6'/><path d='M400,100 C450,150 500,100 550,150' stroke='#40C4FF' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/></svg>

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This banner is a playful, visually engaging advertisement for a toy product set in a vivid, child-friendly theme. The background features a soft, diagonal gradient of pastel pinks and purples with abstract design elements like dots, waves, and dashed strokes to enhance visual interest. A prominent image of a colorful toy set is centered within a dashed circular frame that draws attention to the product.

Text layers "heading" and "subheading" introduce the product theme with bold, eye-catching typography in purple shades. A rounded blue price badge labeled "price" overlays part of the circle, enhancing visibility. Supporting details are provided in layer "description" beneath the product image. A call-to-action button made from layers "cta_background" and "cta" sits at the bottom, encouraging users to shop now with a contrasting blue button and white text for high readability.

**Color Palette:**
- Pastel Pink: `#FFC8E8`
- Warm Pink: `#FF80AB`
- Deep Purple: `#5E35B1`
- Violet: `#6A1B9A`
- Cyan Blue: `#40C4FF`
- Sky Blue Gradient: `#80D8FF` to `#40C4FF`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and playful color palette that appeals to children. Dominant colors include candy pink (#F84CA7) used in the upper house, mint green (#43C7A3) for grass and foliage, and soft peach (#F4B684) for the base and pillars. Additional accents come from bright purple (#A882E4) in decorative elements, cerulean blue (#3EB6D6) in the hammock and bowl, and red-pink (#EB4067) in the toy fish. The colors are carefully blended to maintain visual harmony while also highlighting key elements like the pets and accessories. This cheerful, pastel-heavy palette is ideal for a lively and engaging advertisement banner.
